Each year the Council plans its spending for the following year. Do you know where the money comes from? Do you know how we make decisions? Do you run a mile when people mention budgets?

Public meetings are taking place to consult residents on budget plans:

enter details

If you would like to ask a question or make any comments about the budget consultation process, including any ideas about how it could be improved in future years, or if you would like to find out about the budgetary consultation conducted last year, please use the contact details above.
